issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Certain iOS frameworks require that they be added to the Embedded Binaries section of an XCode project. Because this file is overwritten each time we build a project we cannot add the entry directly. We need to be able to add Embedded Binaries to our Appcelerator xcode projects.
fields.summary: Unable to add Embedded Binaries to Appcelerator XCode project

comments.body: Hello, Please share the frameworks that you want to use in your project.

I needed to follow these instructions to resolve this. It looks like this will be fixed in 7.0.0.

https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/hook-embedded-frameworks

This can be closed.
